title: Episode 615: A 12-Year-Old Girl Takes On The Video Game Industry
teaser: A 12-year-old girl discovers it can cost a lot more to play video games as a girl. Today on the show: video game economics and a sixth-grade smackdown.
contentencoded:
Maddie Messer is 12, and she loves a good video game. One of her favorites is called Temple Run. In fact, it's one of the most successful games out there.

Temple Run is free to playâ€”if you play as the default character, Guy Dangerous. But playing as a girl character can cost extra. Maddie found out this was true for a lot of games, and she didn't think that was very fair.

Today on the show: a 12-year-old girl takes on the entire video game industry.

Music: Podington Bear's "Camp" and Sia's "Elastic Heart." Find us: Twitter/ Facebook/ Spotify/ Tumblr.
